channel.title: Reset problem#2
channel.description: hey every1, i have a small problem with my server and the other thread i made didnt get any feedback and was ignored so i made this 1 to see if anyone could help me now, sometimes when ppl log out and back in it resets their char. anyone know how to fix this? its not all ppl, just a few every now and then. any help at all would be well appreciated :) ty in advance
